LanguageData.WildMode_desc: EXPERIMENTAL. No rules for sex. All limiting requirements are turned off. Enjoy the wildest side of Rimworld.
LanguageData.STD_FromFloors_desc: If enabled, STD will be catched not only from the persons carrying it, but also from the environment
LanguageData.PrisonersBeating_desc: Will comfort prisoners get beaten in the acts?
LanguageData.OffspringLookLikeTheirMother_desc: Percent chance the offspring will take after the mother
LanguageData.OffspringIsHuman_desc: Percent chance the offspring will be human
LanguageData.PregnantCoeffecientForHuman_desc: Percent multiplier applied to women's pregnant chance
LanguageData.PregnantCoeffecientForAnimals_desc: Percent multiplier applied to female animals' pregnant chance
LanguageData.UseParentMethod_desc: Use either the parent weighting or the species weighting when creating offspring
LanguageData.SexFreeForAllAge_desc: Pawns older than the free-for-all age will be allowed to have sex with animals and, people that also reached the age. \nPawns younger than the free-for-all age will only have sex with others within 2 biological years of their own age
LanguageData.SexMinimumAge_desc: Pawns must be this old to have sex at all (should be lower or equal to free-for-all age).It should only affect the behaviors introduced by RJW.
LanguageData.NonFutaWomenRaping_MaxVulnerability: Max vulnerability level that will allow non-futa women go raping
LanguageData.NonFutaWomenRaping_MaxVulnerability_desc: (Vulnerability varies between 0 to 3) Setting the value to negative number to disable non-futa women raping.\n If the value is non-negative, then the non-futa women with vulnerability not larger than the value will rape.
LanguageData.Rapee_MinVulnerability_human: Min vulnerability that allow a human being raped
LanguageData.Rapee_MinVulnerability_human_desc: (Vulnerability varies between 0 to 3) Setting the value to negative number to disallow human being raped.\n If the value is non-negative, then the people with vulnerability not less than the value may be raped.
LanguageData.Rapee_MinVulnerability_animals: Min vulnerability that allow an animal being raped
LanguageData.Rapee_MinVulnerability_animals_desc: (Vulnerability varies between 0 to 3, you might not see the value in-game but it exists)\n Setting the value to negative number to disallow animals being raped.\n If the value is non-negative, then the animals with vulnerability not less than the value may be raped.
LanguageData.CommandBedSetAsWhoreDesc: Whether this bed is for whores.
LanguageData.RJW_Opportunistic_Infection_Message: {0} has developed an infection due to the weakened immune system.
LanguageData.RJW_Syphilis_Damage_Message: {0} has suffered permanent damage to {1} {2} due to an advanced {3} infection.
LanguageData.PawnCantRapeCP: The target isn't healthy enough or is in a forbidden position.
LanguageData.PawnCantRapeCP0: The pawn don't need sex, is not healthy, or cannot rape.
LanguageData.PawnCantRapeCP1: The pawn is not single or has his partner around.
LanguageData.PawnCantRapeCP2: The pawn is not zoophiliac so can't rape animals.
LanguageData.AnalSexSucceeded: {0} had a successful anal sex with {1}.
LanguageData.AnalSexFailed: {0} failed to have an anal sex with {1}.
